actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide revised reimbursement criteria for small rural health clinics utilizing National Health Service Corps personnel.

summary.text: Rural Health Clinics Act of 1983 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that small rural health clinics (as defined by this Act) using National Health Service Corps personnel shall have to repay the Public Health Service for such services only if actual revenues exceed their estimated budgets. Authorizes an additional payback waiver if such clinics demonstrate need or service improvement plans.

titles.title: A bill to provide revised reimbursement criteria for small rural health clinics utilizing National Health Service Corps personnel.
